adresse.alertstripe.feil.fixme: Unfortunately, we cannot accept digital applications right now. Apply using a paper form, or try again later.

adresse.alertstripe.feil.v2: {{kommuneNavn}} municipality cannot accept digital applications right now. <lenke>Apply using a paper form</lenke>, or try again later.

adresse_med_fylke.alertstripe.advarsel: {{kommuneNavn}} municipality ({{fylkeNavn}}) cannot accept digital applications. You can <a href="https://www.nav.no/sosialhjelp/sok-papir" target="_blank">apply using a paper form</lenke>.
adresse_med_fylke.alertstripe.advarsel.v: {{kommuneNavn}} municipality ({{fylkeNavn}}) cannot accept digital applications. You can <lenke>apply using a paper form</lenke>.
adresse_med_fylke.alertstripe.feil: {{kommuneNavn}} municipality ({{fylkeNavn}}) cannot accept digital applications right now. <a href="https://www.nav.no/sosialhjelp/sok-papir" target="_blank">Apply using a paper form</lenke>, or try again later.

adresse_med_fylke.alertstripe.feil.v2: {{kommuneNavn}} municipality ({{fylkeNavn}}) cannot accept digital applications right now. <lenke>Apply using a paper form</lenke>, or try again later.
adresse_med_fylke.alertstripe.suksess: The application will be sent to: {{navkontorNavn}}, {{kommuneNavn}} municipality ({{fylkeNavn}}).

avbryt.forklaring: Your application has been saved up to this point - you can return and submit the form later. The application will only be saved for two weeks before being deleted. If you choose to delete the application now, all information will be deleted.
avbryt.navigasjon.forklaring: Before you close the application, you must select whether you wish us to save it so that you can continue later, or whether you wish to delete all of the content in the application. Please note that if you choose to complete the application later, it will be saved for two weeks before it is deleted.
avbryt.navigasjon.tekst: If you close the application, the information will not be saved. Whatever you have entered up to this point will be deleted.
avbryt.navigasjon.uthevet.tekst: Are you sure you wish to close the application?
avbryt.soknadslettet.tekst: The application and all attachments have been deleted. To start a new application, you must return to ‘Forms’ on My Page.
avbryt.tekst: If you close the application you have started, it will not be saved and the information you have entered will be deleted.

familie.barn.hjelpetekst.tekst: State all children you are obliged to provide for (cover necessary expenses for). You are obliged to provide for your children under 18 years of age, even if they do not live with you. If your finances allow, you must provide for your children until they have completed secondary education.
familie.barn.sporsmal: Do you have children you are obliged to provide for?
familie.barn.true.barn.borsammen.sporsma: Does the child live with you permanently?
familie.barn.true.barn.deltbosted.hjelpe: Shared residence means that the child lives with both parents after separation. In such case the parents have formed an agreement on shared residence or a court has decided that the child shall share his/her residence with the parents. This means that the child lives (approximately) an equal amount of time with both of the parents, and both must agree regarding decisions affecting the child’s daily life. Shared residence is not the same as if the child has visits with both parents half of the time.
familie.barn.true.barn.deltbosted.sporsm: Does the child have shared residence?

feilmelding.innsending.1: All of your entered data has been saved; however, the application has not been submitted. You must submit the application again later. You can receive a link to the application by e-mail.
feilmelding.innsending.2: You can also find your application by going to
feilmelding.tps: NAV’s system for personal data is unfortunately not available. Please try again later.
feilside.404.fantIkkeSide: We could not find the page you are trying to open.
feilside.ikkefunnet.feilmelding: If this concerns a completed submitted/deleted application, <lenke>return to start page</lenke>.
feilside.serverfeil.feilmelding: Sorry, we have technical problems. An application for financial assistance is not possible to complete. We recommend that you try again a little later.
feilside.serverfeil.informasjon: The application was last saved {{0}} and you can continue with your application later.
feilside.serverfeil.informasjon.ikkeLagr: The application has been set up, but no responses have been saved. You can continue with the application later.
feilside.serverfeil.nodsituasjon.tekst: If you do not have money for necessary things such as food, you must contact your NAV office. NAV will also help you to find a temporary place of residence if you have nowhere to sleep or to stay in the next 24 hours.
feilside.serverfeil.opprett.informasjon: Something went wrong - we were unable to set up the application. You can try again now, or wait until later.
feilside.serverfeil.tittel: Sorry, we have a fault on our side.
feilside.serverfeil.prov.igjen: We recommend that you try again.
feilside.serverfeil.til.startsiden: To the home page for the application
feilside.serverfeil.loggfort: The incident has been logged and the problem will be rectified as soon as possible.
feilside.serverfeil.papir: You can also <lenke>apply for financial assistance on paper</lenke> at your NAV office.
feilside.serverfeil.startside: Go to the front page for financial assistance
feilside.soknadikkefunnet.informasjon: We could not find your application. This may be due to a fault in the system or that the application has been deleted.
fil.feil.format: Wrong file format. You must upload a PDF, PNG or JPG file.

fil.feil.signert: Signed PDF file. You must upload an unsigned file.
fil.for.stor: The file is too large. Maximum file size is 10 MB.
fortsettSenere.epost.label: Send me a link by e-mail (not mandatory)
fortsettSenere.epost.pattern.feilmelding: The format of the e-mail address is incorrect.
fortsettSenere.epost.required.feilmeldin: You must enter an e-mail address
fortsettSenere.info: All of your entered data has been saved; however, the application has not been submitted to NAV. You can continue with submission later by logging into My Page. We can also send you an e-mail with a link back to the submission.
fortsettSenere.kvittering.tekst: We have sent an e-mail to the following address:
fortsettSenere.sendEpost.epostInnhold: You have chosen to continue submitting the application later. You can do so via this link: {{0}} . The application has not been submitted to NAV. Applications you have started on, but not submitted, will be automatically deleted if you do not continue them within eight weeks. Yours sincerely, NAV
fritekst.feilmelding: You must shorten the text to 500 characters
fritekst.informasjon: If you have further information you believe is important to your application, you can add them here.
fritekst.informasjon.ingen: No supplementary information has been added
fritekst.label: Supplementary information
hvormye.faktum.sporsmal: What is the extent of visits you have with the child?
ikkefunnet.informasjon: The form you requested was not found in our systems.
informasjon.hilsen.tittel: This information can be useful to read before you start your application.
informasjon.husbanken.bostotte: Housing allowance from Husbanken is a state support scheme for those on low incomes with high housing costs. Housing allowance is intended to help pay housing costs. You have responded that you have housing costs, but do not receive housing allowance. We recommend that you check whether you can receive<a href="https://husbanken.no/bostotte"  target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">support from Husbanken</lenke>.
informasjon.husbanken.bostotte.v2: Housing allowance from Husbanken is a state support scheme for those on low incomes with high housing costs. Housing allowance is intended to help pay housing costs. You have responded that you have housing costs, but do not receive housing allowance. We recommend that you check whether you can receive<lenke>support from Husbanken</lenke>.
informasjon.ikketilgang.bruker.tekst.v2: Unfortunately, you cannot use the digital application for financial assistance. People with code 6 or 7 cannot apply for financial assistance digital. Contact your local <lenke>NAV office</lenke> to receive help applying.
informasjon.ikketilgang.tekst.v2: You have now come to a digital service for applying for financial assistance. The service is under development, and at present, only residents with an address in Horten, Skien, Bergen, Oslo, Trondheim and Askøy municipalities can use the service. If you require financial assistance you must contact your <lenke>local NAV office.</lenke>
informasjon.nodsituasjon.tekst: If you do not have money for food or a place to stay for the next 24 hours, you can apply for help in an emergency situation. In addition to submitting the application, you should contact NAV or be available by phone after you have submitted the application.
informasjon.nodsituasjon.undertittel: Are you in an emergency situation?
informasjon.samtykke.info_del1: When you started the application, you chose to obtain information from
informasjon.samtykke.info_del2: This information may have changed - we can update it for you If you wish you can delete the information before you submit the application.
informasjon.start.tekst_del1: In order to get a reply as quickly as possible, you should fill in the application as best you can, and attach relevant documentation.
informasjon.start.tekst_del2: See examples of <lenke>what documentation we might ask for</lenke>.
informasjon.start.tekst_del3: If you intentionally withhold or provide incorrect information, you may have to pay back the benefit.
informasjon.student.studielan.1.v2: In principle, financial assistance shall not finance higher education. Check whether you can apply for alone or bursary at <lenke>lanekassen.no</lenke>.
informasjon.student.studielan.2: There are some exceptions to the right to financial assistance. This may apply if you have a temporary need for help before you have received payments from Lånekassen, or are in an emergency situation. Contact your NAV office to clarify your needs and to receive information, advice and guidance.
informasjon.svarpasoknad.tekst: Municipalities have varying response times. If more than one month has passed since you submitted your application, you should receive a letter that the case processing time has been extended.
informasjon.svarpasoknad.undertittel: When you receive a response to the application
informasjon.innhenting.undertittel: Collecting and processing of personal data
informasjon.innhenting.tekst_del1: We automatically collect information from public registers. By pressing "Start application" you accept this.
informasjon.innhenting.tekst_del2: <lenke>Read more about the collection and processing of your personal data</lenke>.
informasjon.tekster.personopplysninger.e: When you submit the application, it will be sent to the municipality in which you are resident. The municipality is responsible for processing the application and for storing the information in the municipal administration system.
After the application has been submitted
informasjon.tekster.personopplysninger.f: Before you send the application, the information is stored with the Labour and Welfare Service. If you click “Close” before you have submitted the application, all of the information will be deleted. You can choose to close the process at any time during application.
informasjon.tekster.personopplysninger.i:
You must enter your own information in the application. In addition, we obtain information from public registers to which we have legitimate access. Examples are family information from the National Population Register, information about your work situation from the State Register of Employers and Employees and information about state support from NAV.



If you do not want us to obtain this personal information automatically, you can use a paper form to apply for financial assistance. You can download the paper form at nav.no or pick it up at the NAV-office.
informasjon.tekster.personopplysninger.r: Read more about the processing of personal data.

You have the right to receive information about and access to your own personal information. If the information contains errors, or is incomplete or unnecessary, you can request that the information be corrected or supplemented.
informasjon.tekster.personopplysninger.s: If you have any questions concerning personal information, please contact your NAV office.
informasjon.tekster.personopplysninger.t: How we process your personal information
informasjonsside.lestbrosjyre.sporsmal: I confirm that I have read and understood the information at: nav.no/dagpenger

inntekt.eierandeler.hjelpetekst.tekst: The term ‘financial value’ means high-value property or assets both in Norway and in foreign countries. We can require you to sell objects that you do not need in your everyday life that can be sold for a significant amount. We cannot demand that you sell personal property such as clothes and household effects of a normal standard.
inntekt.eierandeler.infotekst.tekst: For example, a housing or vehicles
inntekt.eierandeler.sporsmal: Do you own anything with a financial value?
inntekt.inntekter.hjelpetekst.tekst: We need to know if you have received monetary payment in the form of dividends on shares, funds, sale of assets or elsewhere.
inntekt.inntekter.sporsmal: Within the last three months, have you received money that is neither wages nor benefits from NAV?

kvittering.informasjonstekst.del1: You can forward documentshere. If any documents are to be sent to NAV by anyone other than yourself (doctor, employer), you must notify the person/persons, to be certain they will be sent.
kvittering.informasjonstekst.del2: If NAV has not received necessary documentation within 14 days, the application can be rejected due to insufficient information.
kvittering.innsendt.tittel: The following attachments have been sent
kvittering.normertbehandlingstid: Here you can see <a href="https://www.nav.no/no/NAV+og+samfunn/Om+NAV/Saksbehandlingstider+i+NAV">case processing times</lenke> in your county.
kvittering.saksbehandling.tekst: Case processing times vary from municipality to municipality. When we have processed your application, you will receive a decision. If the process takes longer than one month, you will receive a preliminary response. If we do not have sufficient information, or you have not provided all necessary attachments, it will take longer to respond to your application. Therefore, we recommend that you forward any attachments as soon as possible, preferably within 14 days. You can also forward information requested in your decision, for example in connection with terms and conditions or other agreements with NAV. You can forward attachments at Mine Sider/Mine Saker.
kvittering.saksoversikt.informasjon: You can follow your case in NAV. From the case side, you can receive further information about your application and you can notify of any important changes.
kvittering.samtale.tekst: If you apply for financial assistance, you will normally be called in to an interview with an adviser. You can also contact your NAV office to arrange a meeting. <a href="https://www.nav.no/sosialhjelp/slik-foregar-et-mote"  target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Read more about how meetings are held.</lenke>
kvittering.situasjon.tekst: You must notify us if your financial situation changes after you have submitted the application.
kvittering.skrivutknapp.label: Printout application
kvittering.tekst.post: , which will be the office processing your case.
kvittering.tekst.pre: The application has been sent to
kvittering.undertittel: Application for financial assistance has been sent.
kvittering.vedlegg.tittel: Supplementary information required by NAV to process your application

nedetid.alertstripe.send: You cannot send digital applications in the period {{nedetidstart}} – {{nedetidslutt}} due to technical maintenance. Contact your local NAV office if you need to apply for financial assistance during this period.

opplysninger.ikkebesvart.avsnitt1: We see that you have not responded to information regarding your financial situation. For us to process your application as quickly as possible, it is important that you provide us with this information.
opplysninger.ikkebesvart.avsnitt2: You can add attachments to your application. If you do not have all of the attachments at this time, you can forward missing documentation after you have sent the application. You can also submit these at your NAV office.
opplysninger.ikkebesvart.melding: We see that you have not responded to information regarding your financial situation. For us to process your application as quickly as possible, it is important that you provide us with this information.
opplysninger.informasjon: Here you must state your income and expenses. The fields below are based on information that you have provided during the application. It is important that, to the extent possible, you complete all information regarding your financial situation and provide documentation. If you have paper documentation, you can scan it or <a href="https://www.nav.no/no/NAV+og+samfunn/Kontakt+NAV/Relatert+informasjon/ta-bilde-av-vedleggene-med-mobilen" target="_blank">take a picture of the documentation with your mobile telephone</lenke>. If you do not have all of the attachments at this time, you can forward missing documentation after you have sent the application. You can forward the information by post, or submit it at your NAV office.
opplysninger.informasjon.avsnitt1: Here you can state your income and expenses, and upload attachments as part of your application.
opplysninger.informasjon.avsnitt2: If you do not have all of the attachments at this time, you can forward missing documentation after you have sent the application. You can also submit these at your NAV office.
opplysninger.informasjon.lenke: Do you need help to send information?
opplysninger.informasjon.modal.bolk1.avs: If you have information on paper, you can scan it and send it digitally. Scanned information will be of better quality and be easier for the NAV office to read.
Using a scanning app, you can use the camera on your mobile telephone to scan information. You can compile several paper pages into one digital attachment - for example your tenancy agreement.

You can also take a picture of your paper information with your mobile telephone. You can attach the images when you send attachments from your mobile phone. If you use a PC, you can first send the images to yourself by e-mail, then upload them to nav.no.
opplysninger.informasjon.modal.bolk2.avs: If you wish to send information from another website, download the content if possible. For example, tax returns, decisions from Lånekassen and account statements from some banks can be downloaded as PDF files. Avoid taking pictures of a PC screen with a camera.
opplysninger.informasjon.modal.bolk3.avs: It is important that you check that the information you upload is complete and can be read on the screen. If it is difficult to read the information, we may ask you to re-send it.
opplysninger.informasjon.modal.bolk3.tit: Make sure that the information you send is legible
opplysninger.informasjon.modal.bolk4.avs: If you have problems sending attachments, you can check whether the attachment:
Is less than 10 MB per document
Is of the file type PDF, JPEG or PNG
Contains other characters than numbers and letters in the file name
opplysninger.informasjon.modal.bolk4.tit: Can we not accept the attachments you are trying to submit?
opplysninger.informasjon.modal.overskrif: Do you need help to send information?

soknadsmottaker.kommunenavn.label: Municipality
soknadsosialhjelp.forstesiden.bekreftInf:
Information

When you apply for financial assistance digitally, you must provide your personal information so that the NAV office can process your application. Examples of information are your living situation, assets and expenses.


In addition, NAV will obtain information from public registers on behalf of the municipality that will process your application.

You can be confident that your personal information will be processed in a secure, correct manner:


  • We will not obtain any more information than is necessary.
  • NAV has a duty of non-disclosure in respect of all information that we process. If public agencies or others wish to obtain your personal information, they must have legal access or you must provide your consent.

Obtaining your personal information

You enter information about yourself in your application. In addition, we obtain information that NAV holds in registers that we are permitted to use:


  • Information concerning citizenship, address and family situation from the National Population Register.
  • Information concerning account numbers.
  • Information concerning telephone numbers from the contact and reservation register.

  • Information concerning your work situation from the State Register of Employers and Employees.
  • Information about state benefits from NAV.

If you give your consent in the application, we will also obtain information concerning taxable income from the Tax Administration and information concerning housing allowance from Husbanken.

Purpose of compiling and using personal information

The purpose of the application is to compile sufficient information so that the municipality can process your application for financial assistance. The information you provide in the digital application and information we obtain, will be sent digitally from nav.no to your NAV office. It will be easier for you to apply and your NAV office receives the application fully completed with the necessary attachments.


The information in your application will be used to evaluate whether you comply with requirements regarding financial assistance and will not be stored for any longer than necessary. If the information is not to be stored according to the Archive Act or other legislation, it must be deleted after use.

Legal basis

The legal basis for collecting information in connection with your application is the Act relating to social services in the Labour and Welfare Administration.

Data controller

The municipality in which you are resident is responsible for processing the application and for handling your personal information.

Contact the municipality if you have any questions regarding personal information. The municipality also has a Data Protection Officer you can contact.

The Labour and Welfare Administration is responsible for nav.no and is the data processor on behalf of the municipality. Here you can read more about personal data protection and security at nav.no.

Storing your personal data

Before you submit the application, your information is stored at nav.no.

Applications that have been started but not completed are stored by the Labour and Welfare Administration for two weeks. Thereafter, they are deleted.

After you have submitted the application, the municipality is responsible for your personal information

When you submit your application, we use KS’ (Norwegian Association of Local and Regional Authorities’) cloud service for digital post (Svarut). The municipality obtains your application in Svarut and stores the information in municipal administrative systems. Your municipality is responsible for storage and deletion of your information, both in Svarut and the administrative system. The Archive Act determines how long information can be stored. Contact your municipality if you have any questions regarding storage periods.

Rights as a registered person

Everyone has the right to information about and access to their own personal information according to the Personal Data Act.

If information about you is incorrect, incomplete or unnecessary, you can request that the information be corrected or supplemented. In special cases, you can request that the information be deleted. In certain cases, the municipality has a legal obligation to store the information as documentation. Such demands must be responded to at no charge and at the latest within 30 days.


You also have other personal data protection rights, including so-called the right to limitation.: In certain cases, you also have the right to have a limited processing of your personal information. If you have this right, the information will be stored, but not used.


You also have the right to object against processing of personal information: This means that in certain cases you can have the right to object against the municipality’s otherwise lawful processing of personal information. In such case, processing must cease and if your case is upheld the personal information will be deleted.


The Data Protection Authority's website has an overview of your rights. Your municipality also has information concerning processing of personal information on its website.

Any enquiries you have regarding processing of your personal information must be made to your NAV office.

Right of appeal to the Data Protection Authority

You have the right to complain to the Data Protection Authority if you are not satisfied with how we process your personal information, or if you believe the processing violates the personal data protection rules, Information about how to submit a complaint is available on the Data Protection Authority's website.
soknadsosialhjelp.forstesiden.bekreftOpp: I confirm that I have read and understood the information regarding consent
soknadsosialhjelp.forstesiden.rettighete: Applications that are started, but not completed, will be saved by nav.no for two weeks. Thereafter, they are deleted. Read about your
soknadsosialhjelp.oppsummering.bekreftIn:
I give my consent that the information I have provided in this application, and the information that will be obtained from other registers in accordance with applicable legislation, can be transferred to {{kommuneNavn}} municipality, c/o NAV {{navKontorNavn}}. This is so that the NAV office will be able to process my application for financial assistance. {{kommuneNavn}} municipality cannot disclose my information to other parties unless I have given my consent or they have the right according to legislation.

Consent to obtain information and to exchange these with the municipality applies only to the processing of this application.

I have been informed that the information will be stored in the administrative system of {{kommuneNavn}} municipality c/o NAV {{navKontorNavn}}. I have also been informed that I can request access to this information, and request deletion or correction of information about myself. I understand that giving this consent is voluntary and that consent can be withdrawn at any time. If I wish to withdraw my consent, I will make enquiries at {{kommuneNavn}} municipality c/o NAV {{navKontorNavn}}.

If you do not wish to give your consent as described above, you must enquire at your local NAV office and complete a manual application form.
Consent concerning personal information for this application
soknadsosialhjelp.oppsummering.bekreftOp: You may lose your right to benefits if the information you provide is not correct or complete. NAV can withhold or reclaim money. Providing incorrect information can be punishable.
soknadsosialhjelp.oppsummering.harLestSa: I confirm that the information I have provided is correct.
soknadsosialhjelp.oppsummering.infoSamty: Information concerning your personal privacy rights.
To begin with the application, you must confirm that you have read and understood information regarding consent. I confirm that I have read and understood the information regarding consent. To be able to apply for financial assistance digitally, it is necessary that you give your consent that the information you provide and the information obtained according to applicable legislation, can be transferred to the NAV office in your municipality for final case processing. You will at all times be able to see which information NAV obtains in your application. When you have completed the application and are ready to submit it, you will be asked to authorise a consent declaration for transfer to your local NAV office. If you already at this point know that you do not wish to give your consent to transfer your application to your local NAV office, you must contact your NAV office to complete a manual application form.

I give my consent that the information I have provided in this application, and the information that will be obtained from other registers in accordance with applicable legislation, can be transferred to my local NAV office. This is so that the NAV office will be able to process my application for financial assistance. The municipality cannot disclose my information to other parties unless I have given my consent or they have the right according to legislation. The consent to obtain information and to exchange this with the municipality applies only to processing of this application. I have been informed that the information will be stored in a case processing system at my local NAV office. In addition, I have been informed that I can request access to this information, and request deletion or correction of information about myself. I understand that giving this consent is voluntary and that consent can be withdrawn at any time. If I wish to withdraw my consent, I will make enquiries at my local NAV office.
soknadtilleggsstonader.ettersending.titt: Forward attachments to the application for unemployment benefit
soknadsosialhjelp.oppsummering.hvorsende: Your application will be sent to {{valgtEnhetsNavn}}.
The NAV office will process your application as quick as possible, and will contact you if they need anything from you!
system.familie.barn.antall.sporsmal: Number of registered children under 18 years of age
system.familie.barn.sporsmal: We have registered that you have children
system.familie.barn.true.barn.deltbosted: Shared residence means that the child lives with both parents after separation. In such case, the parents have formed an agreement on shared residence or a court has decided that the child shall share his/her residence with the parents. This means that the child lives (approximately) an equal amount of time with both of the parents, and both must agree regarding decisions affecting the child’s daily life. Shared residence is not the same as if the child has visits with both of the parents half of the time.
Does the child have shared residence?

system.familie.sivilstatus.informasjonsp: We evaluate your joint finances when we calculate financial assistance. In such case we require information and documentation concerning the situation of your spouse. Your spouse can submit their own digital application, or you can contact your local NAV office.
Spouses have a mutual obligation to provide for each other

vedlegg.behandlet.VedleggSendesAvAndre: Attachment will be submitted by someone else
vedlegg.behandlet.alleredeSendt.fritekst: You must state which attachments have been submitted previously, and the date when they were submitted.
You must state which attachments have been submitted previously, and the date when they were submitted.
vedlegg.behandlet.sendesAvAndre.fritekst: You must state who will be submitting the attachment.
NAV must receive the attachment within 14 days - if not, there is a risk that your application will be rejected. You must state who will be submitting the attachment.
vedlegg.behandlet.sendesIkke.fritekst.fe: You must state the reason why you are not submitting the attachment.
vedlegg.behandlet.sendesIkke.fritekst.sp: It is likely that your application will be rejected. You must in any case state the reason why you are not submitting the attachment.
You must state the reason why you are not submitting the attachment at this time.
NAV must receive the attachment within 14 days - if not, there is a risk that your application will be rejected. You must state the reason why you are not submitting the attachment at this time.

vedlegg.faktum.vedleggalleredesendt.hjel: If the documentation you submitted with a previous application also applies to the period you are currently applying for, and your situation has not changed, you do not need to submit the attachment this time.
vedlegg.husbanken.vedtak.tittel: Decision on housing allowance for last 2 months
vedlegg.info1: Upload all of the attachments you wish to submit with this application. If you have paper-based attachments and do not have a scanner, you can instead<a href="https://www.nav.no/no/NAV+og+samfunn/Kontakt+NAV/Relatert+informasjon/ta-bilde-av-vedleggene-med-mobilen">take a picture of the document/lenke> with your mobile telephone.
vedlegg.info2: Here you can check <a href="https://www.nav.no/no/NAV+og+samfunn/Om+NAV/Saksbehandlingstider+i+NAV" target="_blank">case processing times</lenke>  in your county. If you upload all of the attachments at once, your case processing time may be shorter.
vedlegg.info3: If you need to forward attachments, you must send these within 14 days. If we do not receive the attachments within the deadline, we will not have sufficient information to process your case. We will determine your case using the information we have available, and you risk having your application rejected.
vedlegg.infoboks.lastopp: You can upload the documents later in the application.
vedlegg.inlinefeilmelding: You must either upload the attachment or respond that you will forward it later
